programme.title: Bittersweet Destiny
programme.desc: An accident leads to the murder of legendary chef Wanli, the disappearance of his daughter And the separation of his 4 disciples. Years later, a forgotten secret unravels the mystery behind everything.

programme.title: Formosa Sebiro
programme.desc: Set in the 1950s and 1960s, this heartfelt drama centers on a female tailor, depicting how she had to overcome challenges to become a top tailor in the male-dominated industry.

programme.title: Dont Worry! ITS OK
programme.desc: Co-hosted by Miao Keli and Stan Chen, this talk show addresses current events and world issues, touching upon lifes big and small things in a relaxed atmosphere and light manner!

programme.title: I Love Hua Hee
programme.desc: Jack, Royce, and Fun Fun try to threaten the position of the Hua Hee Family. Jentzen is cursed as a princess, and Fun Fun gets a frog instead of a prince! Will they find their dream princes?

programme.title: Rally for Love
programme.desc: The story starts with Malaysian badminton player Tang Jia Jie, who travel to Taiwan in search of the famous coach Xue Zhong Yong, who abandoned his mother, in an attempt to avenge her. Celebrating the anniversary of Astro Hua Hee Dai And Taiwans Formosa TV, this sport series feature cameos from top badminton players including Goh Liu Ying, Li Yang, Wang Chi Lin And Wang Tzu Wei.

programme.title: Everybody Needs Good Luck
programme.desc: Orphan Lucky is stubbornly optimistic despite the hardships she faces. After unfortunate events result in her losing loved ones, she learns to create a better life for herself And her remaining family.

programme.title: Hua Hee Buddies
programme.desc: Four old friends bridge the gap between the human world And spirit realm when they reunite under unusual circumstances. When Nana, a single lady, moves back to her old apartment, she is saved from by three spirits when she nearly drowns in a pool. To rid herself of them, she is forced to help them settle their unfinished business. Along the way, she becomes involved in a series of mysteries.

programme.desc: In the wake of its popular local Hokkien drama Hua Hee Everyday, Hua Hee Dai presents a new Hokkien comedy, Hua Hee Seko-lah! A teacher, who volunteers to teach Mandarin in a Hokkien village, finds himself up against its Hokkien community whose old habits die hard. Living alongside the villagers, the teacher slowly redirects his hard-headed students towards Mandarin in its purest form, while personally experiencing the beauty of Hokkien culture.

Gino plans to get rid of Hani to hide his secret in order to smoothen his marriage with Tyas.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ on a musical field trip! Hes visiting the farm to sing with the cows and sheep, and meeting all sorts of amazing animal friends.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Meekah
programme.desc: Meekah is getting creative with some DIY projects! She learns how to make her own fashion accessories and then tries her hand at painting.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: Join Blippi for a fun hiking and camping adventure! First, Blippi goes for a hike in Priest Point Park, where he learns all about hiking and what you need to know before setting off! He learns about colors, shapes, nature and hiking safety! Then, Blippi explores the great outdoors as he goes on a camping trip! Blippi shows us how to set up a campsite and how to build a tent, before making some tasty smores!

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: How does a recycling truck work? What happens on a farm? Will this object Sink or Float? Blippi explores the world around us with silly dance moves, fun songs, and awesome adventures. There is so much to learn about, it will make you want to shout BLIPPI!

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Get ready for some fun and games! Baby John is at the playground, learning new games and discovering the joy of playing with his friends.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Its Little Angel! Where baby John, his brother, Jack, and sister, Jill inspire kids and families to have fun and to grow and learn through play. Come sing along!

programme.title: Air Asia Buds Adventures
programme.desc: Its time for a high-flying adventure with the Air Asia Buds! Join them as they explore a busy fire station, visit a fun-filled farm, and learn all about amazing animals. Their journey takes them to incredible destinations around the world, from the vibrant streets of Bangkok and the beautiful beaches of the Philippines to the bustling city of Kuala Lumpur. Its a non-stop trip full of fun, learning, and discovery.

programme.title: VeeFriends
programme.desc: The VeeFriends are ready for some friendly competition! The action starts with an exciting egg and spoon race that tests everyones balance and speed. The challenges continue with an intense staring contest, a hilarious water balloon fight, and a strategic game of hide-and-seek. From bubble-blowing contests to seeing who can be the quietest, its a day packed with fun-filled battles where the only goal is to have a great time with friends.

programme.title: Mias Magic Playground
programme.desc: The friends attempt to care for a pet dragonfly and some baby chicks leads to chaos, forcing them to wish for more time and invent a new game.

programme.title: Mias Magic Playground
programme.desc: The friends resolve their different ideas for playtime, leading to helping a lighthouse find its bulb, a bursting ball, and an adventure in opposites.

programme.title: Blippi
programme.desc: How does a recycling truck work? What happens on a farm? Will this object Sink or Float? Blippi explores the world around us with silly dance moves, fun songs, and awesome adventures. There is so much to learn about, it will make you want to shout BLIPPI!

programme.title: Meekah

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Tokwan mula susah hati dengan keadaan Ain yang semakin kemurungan. Fariz cuba untuk rujuk semula dengan Ain. Sementara itu, Ilah dan Adnan cuba untuk menyatukan Ain dengan lelaki lain. Apakah Ain akan menerimanya? Berjayakah Fariz rujuk semula dengan Ain?

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Ilah menghalau Ain dari rumah atas apa yang Ain lakukan. Fariz hadir memujuk semula Ain di rumah. Malangnya, Ain menghalau Fariz dan meminta Fariz pergi. Tok Wan dan Ain akhirnya membuat keputusan untuk berpindah dan membina hidup baru. Fariz tetap mencari Ain? Adakah mereka akan bersatu?

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Fariz mengikuti gerak geri Tokwan dan mencari Ain hingga di kedai. Ain berpura-pura tidak mengenali Fariz. Dalam diam, Ain terluka dan terlalu merindui Fariz. Sementara itu, Fadzlan dan Rohana merancang untuk menyatukan Fariz bersama Rania yang turut sama memendam perasaan pada Fariz. Apakah Fariz akan bersetuju?

programme.title: Rindu Yang Terlarang
programme.desc: Rohana desak Fariz agar berkahwin dengan Rania. Bagaimanapun Fariz menolaknya dan bertegas walau apa cara sekalipun, dia akan tetap berkahwin dengan Ainnura. Dalam waktu yang sama, dalam usaha untuk mendapatkan nombor telefon Ainnura, Fariz sanggup ke pejabat Ainnura, bagaimanapun Iqram tidak setuju kerana bimbang rahsia Ainnura adalah bekas isteri Fariz akan terbongkar. Dalam waktu yang sama, Ilah berusaha dengan pelbagai cara agar Ainnura tidak rapat dengan Fariz.

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: The Day presents the past 24 hours: close to the people, with a clear focus on the essential issue, and guests who outline their viewpoints on the stories of the day.

programme.title: Racun Menantu
programme.desc: After marrying Zain, Sara lived in the same house with Pak Dolah, her father-in-law. Because of the familys grudge, Sara started making trouble by seducing her own father-in-law.

programme.title: Cupid
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai seorang ejen yang bekerja di sebuah syarikat penghancur jodoh yang ditugaskan untuk memikat seorang wanita supaya dapat melupakan suaminya yang telah diisytiharkan meninggal dunia. Namun dia jatuh cinta pada wanita tersebut

programme.title: Cerai
programme.desc: Pengalaman berkurung dengan pasangan selama musim PKP memaksa dua pasangan suami isteri menilai semula perkahwinan mereka yang telah disalah ertikan selama ini.

programme.title: Hingga Jumpa Lagi
programme.desc: Eva is diagnosed with cancer and prays that she could travel back to the past in order to prevent the love between her and her husband so that her husband can lead a happy life. Her prayer is granted

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli and Badariah are always arguing, but in order to prevent the factory where they work from being closed by Qarina, they must work together. Out of hatred, they start feeling for each other.

programme.title: Jihan Nak Displin Anak
programme.desc: Jihan dan suami kalut apabila anak mereka tidak mahu pulang beraya di kampung. Mereka cuba untuk mendisiplinkan anak mereka sebelum hari raya

programme.title: Satu Kampung Dua Orang
programme.desc: Selepas banjir besar melanda, semua penduduk kampung berpindah kerana kampung mereka tidak lagi selamat. Hanya dua beradik yang enggan berpindah atas sebab dan alasan mereka tersendiri.

programme.title: Jamil Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Kisah perjalanan Jamil pulang ke kampung untuk meminang kekasihnya setelah pinangannya pernah ditolak beberapa kali. Berjayakah misi Jamil kali ini?

programme.title: Sampai Nanti
programme.desc: Kyle dan Milly bertemu kembali setelah 10 tahun terpisah dan cinta lama kembali terjalin. Tetapi adakah cinta mereka akan terus kekal hingga ke akhirnya?

programme.title: Asam Pedas Cendol Sejoli
programme.desc: Karim adalah pemilik kedai cendol bersebelahan dengan kedai asam pedas Kalsom. Mereka bermusuhan, tetapi anak mereka Kinah dan Khalil mencintai satu sama lain, dan terpaksa menyembunyikan perkara ini bagi mengelakkan perang antara dua kedai mereka.

programme.title: Tolong Saya Encik Dinosaur
programme.desc: Elly berpindah dari bandar ke pekan kecil untuk mencari ketenangan. Tetapi kenangan buruk tetap menghantui dirinya, sehinggalah dia bertemu dengan Karl yang mengajarnya erti sebuah kebahagiaan.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Cubit - Cubit Cinta
programme.desc: Kupid Cubit is a dating app that enables the masses to find love. But for Katarina and Saiful, its a platform for healing people with unrequited love.

programme.title: Duit Kawin
programme.desc: Memaparkan pemikiran remaja sekarang terhadap perkahwinan dari sudut kos atas syariat agama tetapi tertekan cara hidup zaman kini yang mahukan kemewahan.

programme.title: Biarkan Cinta Tersenyum Lagi
programme.desc: Kisah penulis lagu Maya Arisa yang menghidap tumor otak dan mengimpikan untuk berkahwin. Dia kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang jurugambar bernama Redza.

programme.title: Ayat Dari Langit
programme.desc: Ustaz Muiz dan isterinya mengajar ajaran sesat dan mahu pengikutnya mengikut telunjuk mereka yang lama kelamaan mula membuatkan pengikutnya bernama Kamal mula merasa sangsi.

programme.title: Cinta Round 1
programme.desc: Farid is a nerdy guy who always been bullied by Syakirin, his senior. Farid determined to enter an MMA tournament organized by their university so to put an end to being bullied by Syakirin.

programme.title: Racun Suami Jahanam
programme.desc: Suraya is a naive village girl who looks forward to happy days when Hazrul proposes to her. But those happy days are only temporary when she learns who Hazrul really is.

programme.title: 6 Hari
programme.desc: Suzi is content with being a third wife and living alone in her bungalow as she only entertains her husband every 6 days. Everything comes crashing when a person from her past returns to her life.

programme.title: Please Subscribe Cintaku
programme.desc: Hannah and her friend Alia have gone to an abandoned construction site to find material for her YouTube channel, but she unknowingly records a murder.

programme.title: Diva Dari Jakarta
programme.desc: Erin dan Ejot sering dibandingkan dari segi paras rupa. Sehingga suatu hari sesuatu telah berlaku kepada Erin yang mengubah segalanya.

programme.title: Diam Tanda Setuju
programme.desc: Kisah dua sahabat baik yang berhadapan dengan konflik perhubungan di saat mereka mula panik memikirkan usia mereka yang semakin meningkat tetapi belum bertemu jodoh.

programme.title: Nasiya
programme.desc: Ketika melarikan diri dari bekas suaminya, Ihyana telah mengalami kemalangan tetapi dia bernasib baik kerana telah diselamatkan oleh satu entiti luar biasa yang telah mengubah kelakuannya.

programme.title: Suamiku Encik Beruang
programme.desc: Ani, the most beautiful girl in the village, who is ever mans fantasy, decides to marry Mr. Bear as her husband, much to everyones surprise. As for the chief village, he intend to organise the wedding of the year.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Itu
programme.desc: Kisah kasih sayang seorang ibu terhadap anak kandungnya yang tidak pernah terpadam meskipun si anak menjauhkan diri akibat hasutan keluarga angkatnya sendiri.

programme.title: Well be back at 6.00am
programme.desc: Well be back at 6.00am

programme.title: Kecundang Sebelum Menjanda
programme.desc: Hari terbahagia dalam hidup Nora berubah menjadi suram bila tunangnya menarik diri pada hari pernikahan mereka. Tambah buruk lagi, hari selepas tragedi itu asyik berulang atas sebab-sebab misteri.

programme.title: Aku Raja Lawak
programme.desc: Silah nak jadi pelawak yang terkenal, cuma di kampungnya tak ada peluang pekerjaan pelawak sepenuh masa. Tapi dia tetap mendapat sokongan padu daripada peminat nombor satunya iaitu Faris, anaknya.

programme.title: Bayangan Emilia
programme.desc: Rita berpindah masuk ke banglo Ungku Mahmud dan mula merasai akan kehadiran roh yang seperti tidak senang dengan kehadirannya disitu. Apakah misteri di sebalik rumah banglo tersebut?

programme.title: American Sicario
programme.desc: Based on the true story, Edgar Valdez, drug lord and cartel leader, is betrayed by one of the brothers. Seeking retribution, Valdez will risk it all to gain control of the Feliz cartel.

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: Tormented by his criminal past, Clean attempts a quiet life caring for his community and as a mentor to his young neighbor Dianda. When local gang violence puts his neighbors life in danger, Clean finds himself returning to his violent past.

programme.title: Override
programme.desc: In 2040, a female humanoid A.I. is hacked by her husband and forced to kidnap the U.S. vice presidents son and execute him on live television.

programme.title: Broadcast
programme.desc: After a billionaire creates a drug called INOC which stops the aging process, the future of a world where death no longer exists is seen. The story of the fate of mankind is told while also revealing an elusive truth to its unknowing spectator.

programme.title: Locked In
programme.desc: A single mother must protect her daughter and herself during a heist gone wrong at a high-tech storage facility.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Mayfair - Shooting Paul
programme.desc: Hoping to put the past behind him and go legit, Max is persuaded by Paul to open a new Mister Mayfair club in Portugal. Conflict, however, seems to follow Max wherever he goes. Drawn into a violent turf war between London Gangsters and the Italian Mafia, his relationship with Ava is jeopardised by the arrival of his former flame, Serena. Maxs carefully crafted world seems to be collapsing around him. With his familys lives on the line, Max is blackmailed by British crime boss, Tommy, to assassinate his best friend, Paul.

programme.title: Project Legion
programme.desc: A young man trapped in his apartment with a swarm of demons outside his door must find a way to survive the night and escape from apartment 213.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: Centigrade
programme.desc: A married couple find themselves trapped in their frozen vehicle after a blizzard and struggle to survive amid plunging temperatures and unforeseen obstacles.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.

programme.title: In Isolation
programme.desc: Four friends wanted to get away from it all in a remote country house but when a mysterious injured man turns up on their doorstep telling tales of a city ravaged by a epidemic and the looters who have pursued him, the friends rally to help.

programme.title: Mayfair - Shooting Paul
programme.desc: Hoping to put the past behind him and go legit, Max is persuaded by Paul to open a new Mister Mayfair club in Portugal. Conflict, however, seems to follow Max wherever he goes. Drawn into a violent turf war between London Gangsters and the Italian Mafia, his relationship with Ava is jeopardised by the arrival of his former flame, Serena. Maxs carefully crafted world seems to be collapsing around him. With his familys lives on the line, Max is blackmailed by British crime boss, Tommy, to assassinate his best friend, Paul.

programme.title: Blood Of Redemption
programme.desc: When the most powerful criminal empire in the land comes crumbling down from within, it is up to a former henchman to put the puzzle pieces together in order to find those responsible and extract revenge.

programme.title: Enter The Clones of Bruce
programme.desc: Enter the Clones of Bruce dives into the Bruce Lee exploitation craze, otherwise known as Bruceploitation.

programme.title: The Legion
programme.desc: Noreno, a half-Roman, is entrusted with the mission of crossing the snowy mountains of Armenia, swarming with Parthian patrols, to seek help for his slowly dying men.

programme.title: Johnny And Clyde
programme.desc: Johnny and Clyde are two serial killers who are on an endless crime spree. They decide to assemble a group of criminals and misfits to steal from Alanas casino and pull off the heist of the century.

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: A female FBI agent is offered millions to help a thief escape from a hijacked airplane.

programme.title: Override
programme.desc: In 2040, a female humanoid A.I. is hacked by her husband and forced to kidnap the U.S. vice presidents son and execute him on live television.

programme.title: Mister Mayfair - A Song To Kill For
programme.desc: Max Mayfair has it all; a beautiful girlfriend, Ava, a new London crime family, and thanks to his latest heist, a priceless diamond necklace. However, when mafioso Calbones henchmen catch up with Mike and Armen, determined to drag them back to New York to pay for their crimes, Max has everything to lose. Teaming up with his old friend, Marseille Mafia crime boss, Paul, Max hatches a plan to lure the New York Mafia to Mayfair.

programme.title: Chosen Family
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: Hideout
programme.desc: Evading police at a remote farmhouse after fumbling a robbery, four criminals discover that the family living there is not who they appear to be.

programme.title: Hunting Games
programme.desc: Two dangerous armed men must hunt each other and fight to death over millions of dollars in cash in this high octane wilderness survival story.

programme.title: Blowback
programme.desc: After planning a perfect heist, Nick is ready to score. One problem, his girl and the crew, have other ideas. They take Nick down in a hail of bullets but Nick doesnt die and in a race for his life, seeks revenge one target at a time.

programme.title: Come Out Fighting
programme.desc: During WWII, the American army have raced their way through the countryside on the border of France entering Nazi Germany. Hitler has deployed his secret weapon. Lieutenant Frank Ross encounters the Nazi weapon and an intense aerial battle ensues.

programme.title: Any Bullet Will Do
programme.desc: Two Brothers find themselves on opposing sides of the fight as one hopes to help abolish slavery while the other believes it is his God-given right.

programme.title: The Commando
programme.desc: A DEA agent returns home with PTSD after a botched mission and must now protect his family from a home invasion when a recently freed convict and his henchmen come after their stash of millions hidden inside of the agents home.

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: No information available

programme.title: High Voltage
programme.desc: After a lightning strike kills the lead singer of a band, she is resurrected with electrifying special abilities.

programme.title: Crom
programme.desc: High school teenagers accidentally unleash an ancient Irish entity on their hometown and must stop it before midnight on Halloween.

programme.title: Survival of the Beast
programme.desc: Prowl the Sri Lankan jungle with the leopard, who is a master of camouflage. See how this formidable feline hunter has adapted perfectly to the hot, dry climate on the island.

programme.title: Pride Rules
programme.desc: Come full circle as the dry season descends and the Waterfront Pride enjoys good hunting and renewed confidence in their territory. Then celebrate the success of former outsider Einstein, who gets down to business as the king of his very own pride.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: In JJs world, theres a song for everything! Follow him on a day of musical discovery where every activity has its own special tune. Whether hes playing with his puppy, learning new things at school, or getting ready for bed, this story shows how music can make every part of the day more fun.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Everyone can be a little helper! The kids pretend to be construction workers and learn all about safety. They learn about all the important jobs in their community, from police officers to doctors. Dad is a great helper when he works on the car and the whole family pitches in to clean up around the house. Plus, the kids learn about saving money in their piggy bank.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Join Baby John as he learns all about growing up! The day starts with a fun song about cleaning up his toys. Then, its time to get ready for school and learn about classroom routines. The biggest adventure of all is learning how to be a good big brother and helping take care of his baby sister. Its a day full of important lessons, responsibility, and family fun.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Come along on fun adventures as Blippi journeys off in his BlippiMobile to answer burning questions such as How does a rainbow get its colors? and why is Blippis popsicle melting?. Luckily he has his faithful sidekicks TABBS and D.BO to help him find the answers.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: The world is so much fun to explore! Join Blippi on his adventures as he discovers how rainbows get their colors and what its like on the moon while learning about gravity. Hell dive deep into the ocean with a jellyfish, find out how honey is made from a busy bee, see how snowflakes are formed and get a tour of a real chocolate factory. Its an exciting journey full of amazing discoveries!

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Lets learn about teeth and food! Join JJ to discover his favorite pizza toppings and then take a trip to a farm to count apples. After all that yummy food, learn how to take care of your teeth by brushing them well. When JJ gets nervous about a dentist visit, his siblings show him it can be fun. Plus, learn how to make a healthy and delicious frozen fruit treat!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Sing along with JJ and his friends! Work together to build a giant pillow fort and then go on a fun family vacation in a camper van. Do amazing science experiments with TomTom and YoYo and learn how to make the perfect peanut butter and jelly sandwich. Take a trip to the train park with your grandparents and learn how to take good care of Bingo the dog.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesnt know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Its a day of city-wide chaos as Mila and Morphle are on a mission to find the Mayors lost dog, Barky! With Morphle morphed into a super search-dog, they follow the trail. But their heroic search is interrupted when they must also deal with the naughty Fruit Bandits, who are causing mayhem across town. Its a hectic adventure of tracking clues and stopping troublemakers to restore peace and bring Barky home.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Its a case of whats mined is mine when Rob and Ema go on a rock hunting expedition to the Mineral Planet. When they can only find one of their favorite rocks, they learn an important lesson about sharing. Afterwards, the crew wants to have a special Halloween party and travels to the Pumpkin Patch Planet to find the perfect jack-o-lantern.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The friends are puzzled when theyre missing the last piece of their jigsaw and must travel to the Puzzle Planet to find a replacement. Next, Rob builds a surprise mouse house for Squeak, but when the others suggest improvements, they all head to the Craft Planet to see who can build the best one.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Get ready for a day of vehicles and animals! Mia makes Max his very own fire engine out of a cardboard box. The family takes a fun ride on the big red bus. Mummy makes mealtime more fun by pretending to be different animals. The family has a picnic and helps some ants collect crumbs and Mia and Max enjoy a bike ride with their friend Tootson the Train.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Go Buster: Specials
programme.desc: Its Christmas Eve, but Santa has an accident and wont be able to fly his sleigh. So he calls in his old friend Jada and with the help of Buster the Bus, they can still save Christmas and make sure everyone gets their presents on time. Its a race against time, but Buster is up for the challenge!

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Learn how to stay clean and healthy with Buster! When Buster gets stuck in the mud and then a slimy green puddle, he needs to go to the carwash to get clean. After getting a wobbly tooth from eating too many sweets, he learns about the importance of good dental hygiene. Plus, see what happens when Buster gets sick and his friend Scout fetches Amber the Ambulance to help him feel better.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Meet the newest member of the garage crew: Baby Bus! This story follows her on her very first day. Shes a little nervous, but with the help of Gecko and her new friends, she learns all about her important job and discovers the unique things that she can do. Its a sweet tale about finding your place and being proud of who you are.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Geckos Garage is the repair shop that cares. Run by cheerful mechanic Gecko and his trusty robot sidekicks, The Mechanicals, the garage takes care of all the vehicles in town and keeps them running smoothly. Whether its fixing a flat tyre, stopping a rocket-powered ice cream truck, or rescuing a vehicle thats stuck in the mud, Gecko is always on hand to help with a friendly smile and a can-do attitude!

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Welcome to the learning city farm! Help Ella count all the buses as they drive by. Join Grandma Mei for a fun and active dance session. Make a healthy salad while dancing the salsa and learn how to recycle to save the planet. Plus, learn a silly song to cheer up a friend and celebrate everything that grows with the Growing Song.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for some singing fun at Lellobee City Farm! Learn your ABCs in the Boogie Barn and then learn how to wash your hands before eating some delicious dumplings. Help Ella play Mummy Duck and keep all the baby ducks together. When accidents happen, sing a boo boo song to feel better. End the day with a special Chinese lullaby from Grandma Mei at a sleepover.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Welcome to the fantastical planet of Bod, home to the Minibods. Join six furry baby friends as they get up to hilarious mayhem, turning everyday situations into unexpected, super silly events. Whatever life throws their way, the Minibods overcome hurdles the unconventional way, to better understand themselves and the world around them.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Its party time with Pogo! Hes invited to Jeffs party, but they cant agree on what kind of party it should be. Bubbles invents a new bouncy blob that gets out of control. When Lulu loses her favorite bunny, Bubbles becomes her superhero and helps her find it. Plus, Fuse learns that eating his greens will give him more energy.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Join JJ for a day of nursery rhyme adventures with his animal friends. First, help Mary find her little lamb, then sing about a black sheep with lots of wool. The fun ends with a clapping game all about a farm dog named BINGO. Its a charming story told through our favorite animal songs.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Little World
programme.desc: There are so many important jobs to do! The twins become doctors and help their friends at the park. They also pretend to be firefighters and police officers. They play with toy trucks and learn about garbage trucks and fire trucks. They even get to be construction workers for a day and learn about safety. Plus, they get their very first haircuts!

programme.title: Little World
programme.desc: Its important to be safe and stay healthy! The twins show their love for Mom and pretend to be vets for a sick puppy. Mom teaches them how to brush their teeth properly and they learn about safety at daycare. Nina and Dad have a special day together and Nico learns theres nothing to be afraid of during his first visit to the dentist.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Wind down your day with an evening sing-along! When the stars dont come out, TomTom finds a creative way to make a starry night for JJ. The kids challenge their parents to a fun soccer match. Get excited for the first day back at school where youll learn all about fire drills, make a colorful kaleidoscope and see that its okay when accidents happen.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: After a fun day, its nap time. The friends watch the sleepy clouds go by to help them get ready for a rest. They pretend to row their boats in laundry baskets and build a bridge with blocks. They play Ring-A-Ring O Roses in the garden and Mr. Giraffe takes them for a ride on the bus. Plus, the family has fun with five little monkeys.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: After a long day of play, its time for some quiet time. When Baby John is tired, he can be a little cranky, so a nap will help him feel better. The family learns that its important to rest and relax. The new babysitter has her hands full and the kids have a fun pajama party. Plus, learn about your five senses and what to do when your hands are dirty.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum: Lullabies
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum is here to help you fall to sleep with soothing, relaxing animated lullabies. These gentle and sensory videos are accompanied by lullaby versions of much-loved nursery rhymes, helping to take you to the land of nod.

programme.title: Oddbods: Short
programme.desc: Its a day dedicated to sports and exercise, but for the Oddbods, that means a day of hilarious mayhem. The adventures include trampolining, which results in some unexpected high-flying trouble and a go-kart race that quickly spirals out of control. From the field to the racetrack, the Oddbods attempts at being athletic are a masterclass in how not to play the game, leading to comical mishaps and unexpected outcomes.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready for playtime with JJ! Use your imagination to pretend youre a doctor, then become a hero and play firefighter. When JJ loses his teddy bear, the whole family helps him feel better. Have a thrilling balloon boat race on the farm and then go on a fun camping trip. Have a puppy playdate with Nina and Puddles and play a fun game of Simon Says at a family barbecue.

programme.title: Minibods
programme.desc: Get ready for some cupcake chaos! Lulu wants to bake a cupcake by herself, but when she doesnt follow the recipe, it turns into a giant, out-of-control blob! She also finds a colorful egg that hatches into a cute chick, but she has to let it go back to its mommy. The friends paint a big picture together, but Newt wants it all for herself.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to do the scarecrow dance! Help Sunny the Scarecrow scare away some pesky pigeons to protect the farms crops. Its harvest time, so everyone helps pick the vegetables. Find a safe and quiet place for a hedgehog to hibernate for the winter. Plus, sing a song about Pablo the Pig and Carlos the Calf and get ready for a campfire sing-along.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Get ready for a farming sing-along! When Ella is feeling anxious, she does the five senses shakedown to feel better. She and Rishi play a game of I Hear With My Little Ear to find all the animals on the farm. Do the ABC dance, go stargazing with Grandma Mei and take care of five mischievous monkeys. Plus, learn that its okay to make mistakes and that tidying up can be fun.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Get ready to learn and sing! In this educational adventure, JJ discovers the magic of numbers, the beauty of colors, and the fun of shapes. Each new lesson is a new song, making the learning process an exciting and joyful experience. Its a musical story that proves how fun it is to learn new things.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Exploring the world is fun, but its also important to be safe! Baby John learns that some things are a no no, like touching a hot stove or running into the street without looking. Through gentle guidance and a catchy song, he discovers that rules are there to help keep him safe and sound while he plays.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Learn how to stay healthy with Baby John! He learns that too many snacks can ruin his appetite and that its important to be safe at mealtime. He and his friends learn to rollerblade and Jack and Jill take care of their baby brother. When Baby John gets a boo-boo, he learns that its okay to cry. Plus, find out what to do when you have an itchy bug bite.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Come along on fun adventures as Blippi journeys off in his BlippiMobile to answer burning questions such as How does a rainbow get its colors? and why is Blippis popsicle melting?. Luckily he has his faithful sidekicks TABBS and D.BO to help him find the answers.

programme.title: Blippi Wonders
programme.desc: Get ready for some thrilling adventures with Blippi Wonders! This journey is packed with excitement and learning. Discover how a firetruck and a police car work, learn about the sticky science of glue, and see the amazing power of magnets. Its a fun-filled exploration of the amazing things that make our world work.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Army commando-robot ARPO has been assigned his toughest mission yet: babysitter! With a built-in radar system that scans for danger and an arsenal of baby gear set to deploy at a moments notice, ARPO is programmed to protect. As simple tasks like bath time, feeding, taking a nap, and changing diapers somehow turn into action-packed adventures thanks to Dannys curiosity, ARPO has his work cut out for him.

programme.title: ARPO
programme.desc: Get ready for some friendly competition! Arpo and Daniel are challenged by Nannybot and her baby to a series of exciting contests. The action kicks off with an epic go-kart race that gets more outrageous with every lap. The challenges continue with a variety of sports and games where both teams try to outsmart and outperform each other. Its a fun-filled story about sportsmanship, rivalry, and pulling out all the stops to win.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Its song and dance time! Join JJ, his friends and family celebrating lifes big moments for little kids. Come along and be part of their fun everyday adventures.

programme.title: CeCe Time
programme.desc: Enjoy playtime on the farm with CeCe! Join Cece for a day of fun where she connects with the farm animals in her own special way. She imagines herself as Little Bo Peep on an adventure to rescue her lost toy sheep. Later, Farmer Cece helps round up her classmates, who are all pretending to be different farm animals, just in time for a snack. Its a day of imagination and fun on the farm!

programme.title: JJs Animal Time
programme.desc: Get ready to sing along with the animals! Go on a submarine ride and learn about colors with a family of sharks. JJ hosts a talent show where all his friends can show off their special skills. The friends learn that they are all special in their own way and Humpty Dumpty has a great fall. Play a game of Duck, Duck, Goose, and help Boba find some food when his tummy is rumbling.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: Its a day of city-wide chaos as Mila and Morphle are on a mission to find the Mayors lost dog, Barky! With Morphle morphed into a super search-dog, they follow the trail. But their heroic search is interrupted when they must also deal with the naughty Fruit Bandits, who are causing mayhem across town. Its a hectic adventure of tracking clues and stopping troublemakers to restore peace and bring Barky home.

programme.title: Morphle
programme.desc: My Magic Pet Morphle follows the adventures of Mila and her magical morphing pet, Morphle. Whether they need to stop a magic pet who doesnt know how to control their powers, the town Bandits from stealing things, or the mischievous Orphle from causing havoc, Mila and Morphle always work together to help out!

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: Its time to form a rocket band! The friends head to the Music Planet to prepare for a talent show, but they only have one day to teach Ema how to play an instrument. Their next mission begins when they find a giant bone floating in space and travel to the Museum Planet to discover where it came from.

programme.title: Rob the Robot
programme.desc: The crew gets tricked when Robs magic show goes wrong and Squeak is accidentally turned into a bunny! The friends must travel to the Magic Planet to find a way to change him back. After that magical mishap, the gang celebrates Imagination Day by traveling to a planet where they can each act out being their favorite imaginary character.

programme.title: Little Baby Bum
programme.desc: Little Baby Bum follows the musical adventures of Mia, Twinkle the Star and Baby Max. Everyday moments like bath time, getting dressed, or playing peekaboo become even more fun with new and classic nursery rhymes.

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Buster becomes the backwards bus when he accepts a challenge from Bandit. He also becomes a bubble bus when he gets trapped in a giant bubble at the carwash. He and Scout race to get a new siren and he tries on new tires that are all the wrong size. He even becomes an ambulance bus to save his friend and a disco detective to find a lost friend in a disco tunnel.

programme.title: Geckos Garage
programme.desc: Baby Truck is always ready for an adventure, and today hes leading his friends on an exciting exploration! Their playtime takes a messy turn when Baby Trucks curiosity gets the better of him, and he ends up stuck deep in the mud. It looks like hes in real trouble, but his friends wont leave him behind. This is a wonderful tale of how the smallest heroes, working together as a team, can solve even the stickiest of problems.

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm
programme.desc: Its time to explore Earth and nature! A frog ballerina shows Ella that rain can be fun and is important for the farm. The friends celebrate Earth Day by litter picking and composting. When some of the animals get sick, Ella helps the vet at a makeshift animal hospital. Plus, watch a caterpillar turn into a butterfly and learn some yoga moves with Rishis mom.

Bubbles spoils Pogos magic show by exposing all his secrets and Lulu struggles to make a music video when her star Oddbird keeps marching away.

programme.title: Dance Party
programme.desc: Get ready to dance to all your favorite songs! Join the silly animal dance and then put on your tutu for the ballerina dance. See classic nursery rhymes come to life as a cow jumps over the moon and all the sea creatures help Humpty Dumpty. Dance with the animals in the jungle and see all the different vehicles on the street. End the day with a fun pajama dance party to get all the wiggles out before bed.

Learn the alphabet at school, discover different shapes and even learn how to tell time with some cool robot friends. Plus, bake a cake, brush your teeth and learn about animals big and small. Its a day full of learning and fun!

programme.title: KiiYii

programme.title: Lellobee City Farm

A new rooster is having trouble remembering how to crow, but Ella helps him figure it out. The ducklings have their first flying lesson and the friends clean out the pond to give the animals a nice new home. Plus, celebrate the Moon Festival with a special party.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Ep08 Daniel menyesaki ibunya menyembunyikan sesuatu. Roz pula menyelinap masuk pengkalan operasi Gagak Putih dan telah diserang. Roz berdepan dengan kesilapan masa silamnya sebagai seorang ibu, isteri dan ejen perisik, yang kini kembali untuk memusnahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: #Tom Tom Bak Series
programme.desc: Datuk Aznil Haji Nawawi turun padang sempena pencarian bakat baru #TomTomBak. Ramai yang hadir untuk menonjolkan bakat yang mereka ada. Bermacam ragam And aksi lucu dapat kita saksikan. Anak-anak yang petah berborak juga turut dicari untuk musim terbaru ini.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng mesti bergabung bersama untuk memperbaikinya untuk pelanggan. Namun, Nabil dan Eu Jin tidak hadir kerana mereka obses terhadap Akses Premium untuk permainan yang mereka mainkan.

programme.title: Oh My English!
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.title: #Tom Tom Bak Series
programme.desc: Datuk Aznil Haji Nawawi turun padang sempena pencarian bakat baru #TomTomBak. Ramai yang hadir untuk menonjolkan bakat yang mereka ada. Bermacam ragam And aksi lucu dapat kita saksikan. Anak-anak yang petah berborak juga turut dicari untuk musim terbaru ini.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng mesti bergabung bersama untuk memperbaikinya untuk pelanggan. Namun, Nabil dan Eu Jin tidak hadir kerana mereka obses terhadap Akses Premium untuk permainan yang mereka mainkan.

programme.title: Oh My English!
programme.desc: Di SMK Ayer Dalam, Kelas 3 Merah terkenal sebagai kelas yang mempunyai berbagai kerenah. Pelajar-pelajarnya nakal, suka buat bising. Subjek yang mereka paling tidak gemar ialah Bahasa Inggeris.

programme.title: Family Spy
programme.desc: Eps 01 Roz menjalani kehidupan normal sebagai seorang opah setelah pencen dari kerjaya lamanya iaitu ejen perisik. Suatu hari, cucunya Rin, telah menggodam satu permainan komputer dan dia dihubungi oleh seorang misteri dalam talian yang mengetahui identiti Rin. Roz mengesyaki sesuatu tidak kena, tapi malangnya Rin telah diculik oleh penjahat misteri tersebut sebelum Roz sempat bertindak.

programme.title: Geng Gajet
programme.desc: Mesin pencetak kedai Bob tiba-tiba rosak dan perlu diperbaiki. Aly dan geng Seorang pelanggan mencabar Aly untuk membuat produk untuknya, di mana dia belajar dengan bantuan rakan-rakannya apa yang diperlukan untuk merancang And membina penemuan baru sambil tetap teratur dan fokus.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt is asked by a local cat charity to treat a litter of tiny abandoned kittens. Theyre so weak, its touch and go whether any of them will survive.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: In the UK nearly a quarter of the adult population have made a dog part of their family. But there are some reports RSPCA inspectors respond to that have them thinking otherwise, and in Staffordshire Inspector Charlotte Melvin is left reeling from the shock of what she finds when she investigates one such case. She receives a complaint about a house full of animals, some in cages and living in cramped and dirty conditions. When she arrived things looked so bad that Charlotte calls the police who help her gain access to the property. Inside theres a menagerie of different creatures, from a fox to a snake, to a lizard, all suffering in totally unsuitable quarters. Two of the worst affected are dogs Mocha and Lexi. Mocha has extreme hair loss. As well as having the same terrible skin problems as Mocha, Lexi is also severely emaciated. Charlotte must act fast to help all the animals to survive.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: The white cockatoo is one of the more common macaw species, but its number in the wild has gradually declined in recent years. Hand-reared white cockatoos love to be close to their owners. Their large size is one of their features. Like other large macaws, white cockatoos are really loud, but if its a hand-reared bird raised from a young age, the situation of screaming will be much better. If you want to raise a pair of adult birds, it is ideal to keep them in an open area with good sound insulation or without neighbors. Their friendly personalities make them one of the more suitable large macaw species as pets.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve got stupid vs intelligent dogs, talented dogs, sporty dogs, pug life, dogs getting stuck, sleepy dogs, and dogs acting like humans.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: Fishes swim in the water. What a healing thing it would be to be able to look at the blue ocean every day if we can own an underwater world at home! How can one be the creator of the underwater world? Moreover, in this small ecosystem, most players are male and they even jokingly describe each other as going underwater; Cute Pet Guide takes you to appreciate the mystery of going underwater!

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: A crazy animal expert raises hundreds of pets in their workplace; the super cute characteristics and breeding secrets of pet turtles are revealed; elementary school students favorite beetle army attacks, tailor-made insect jelly taste super delicious; and animal therapist is now on duty, Cute Pet Guide takes you to visit a parent-child farm and get close to various cute pets.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: At Flamingoland, Oscar the male ostrich has been limping and Dr. Matt is determined to find out why.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve got monkey criminals, magic and mirrors, cheeky monkeys, monkey pals, banana loving primates, baby monkeys, monkeys vs cameras, monkeys out on the town, and monkeys acting like us humans.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Huang Yunongs Yunong Reptile Studio has an extraordinary passion for geckos and he regards every gecko as his own. He always feel sad when consumers buy them, just like saying goodbye to his own child. He always shares care knowledge in great detail, and cultivates concepts through his own experience to let more people know more about hem. He hopes that through Cute Pets Coming, the overall gecko raising environment can continue to improve.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Whilst the majority of us Brits look forward to the summer months, for the nations dog rescuers, rising temperatures create a potentially lethal danger for the countrys canines. In 2018 the RSPCA received over 7000 calls concerning dogs suffering in the hot weather, with nearly 2000 in July alone. In this hot weather special episode of -The Dog Rescuers we see the mistakes people have made leaving their dogs and hear solutions and advice on how to keep your dog cool in the heat.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt has been called to the Flamingoland aquarium, to set upright some upside-down male seahorses. He diagnoses gas bubble disease, which means a delicate operation to inject drugs directly into the tiny fishs pouch.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: Have A Pet Day
programme.desc: Renowned Golden Bell awarded host Sandy Wu takes her beloved dog Hershey on outings, inviting celebrities and their adorable pets to join in the fun. Beyond exploring nature, the show delves into heartfelt conversations about the journey of pet ownership and shares touching stories amid delightful scenery and cuisine. The program features various enjoyable activities where owners and pets can bond, creating unforgettable memories through laughter and tears.

programme.title: Best Of Pets
programme.desc: Another episode of Best of Pets with funny pet clips.

programme.title: Cute Pet Guide
programme.desc: A crazy animal expert raises hundreds of pets in their workplace; the super cute characteristics and breeding secrets of pet turtles are revealed; elementary school students favorite beetle army attacks, tailor-made insect jelly taste super delicious; and animal therapist is now on duty, Cute Pet Guide takes you to visit a parent-child farm and get close to various cute pets.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: At Flamingoland, Oscar the male ostrich has been limping and Dr. Matt is determined to find out why.

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: Weve got monkey criminals, magic and mirrors, cheeky monkeys, monkey pals, banana loving primates, baby monkeys, monkeys vs cameras, monkeys out on the town, and monkeys acting like us humans.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Huang Yunongs Yunong Reptile Studio has an extraordinary passion for geckos and he regards every gecko as his own. He always feel sad when consumers buy them, just like saying goodbye to his own child. He always shares care knowledge in great detail, and cultivates concepts through his own experience to let more people know more about hem. He hopes that through Cute Pets Coming, the overall gecko raising environment can continue to improve.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Whilst the majority of us Brits look forward to the summer months, for the nations dog rescuers, rising temperatures create a potentially lethal danger for the countrys canines. In 2018 the RSPCA received over 7000 calls concerning dogs suffering in the hot weather, with nearly 2000 in July alone. In this hot weather special episode of -The Dog Rescuers we see the mistakes people have made leaving their dogs and hear solutions and advice on how to keep your dog cool in the heat.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Dr. Matt has been called to the Flamingoland aquarium, to set upright some upside-down male seahorses. He diagnoses gas bubble disease, which means a delicate operation to inject drugs directly into the tiny fishs pouch.

programme.title: Zoo Vet At Large
programme.desc: Theres excitement as the first baby giraffe to be born at Flamingoland is due at any moment. Can Dr. Matt ensure a safe delivery? And a young male rhino needs a medical MOT before he can meet some females but he just wont co-operate. Meanwhile a macaw with a twisted beak presents Matt with a bit of a challenge.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: Comedian Alan Davies is acting vets assistant at Harmsworth animal hospital in London. Hes helping out with a case of two Staffordshire Bull Terrier sisters who have had a major falling out. With fur flying, one has ended up with nasty wounds to her neck and mouth. Alan helps vet Sam to access and treat the injuries and also learns how to keep your pets from fighting.

programme.title: Cute Pets At Home
programme.desc: Dogs are mans most loyal friends. Their well-behaved and cute appearance is very soothing to our hearts. Thats why many people choose dogs to company with their family! There are many choices for companion dogs, but todays cute pet have well-developed muscles and a fierce look on their faces. But in fact, they love to act cute, making the contrast between their personality and appearance is extremely cute!nTodays Cute Pet Coming is going to subvert everyones impression on them! Follow us and get to know bulldogs with a fierce face and gentle heart!

programme.title: ...Make You Laugh Out Loud
programme.desc: well be seeing the best penguin fails, p-p-p-party penguins, well get up close and personal with wild animals, and well go on safari. well also meet angry animals living the thug life, some crazy critters, and well watch sporty animals in action.

programme.title: My House And Other Animals
programme.desc: Meet the modern-day Dr Doolittles with a passion for all creatures great and small: the unsung heroes of the wildlife world, whose homes have become havens for every animal imaginable.

programme.title: Eating Vegan
programme.desc: On this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown, were switching things up and running on pure plant power! Thats right, today were featuring some incredible vegan eats!

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: We hope you brought your passport, because were heading to Latin America! Whether its breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, were going to show you some delicious dishes, each with their own unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, were going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, theyre ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, its all about cheese: from the melted gooey-ness to just plain old slices, cheese makes the world go round. Well showcase recipes that feature cheese in all forms. So strap in, its time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Mediterranean Meals
programme.desc: Today, were going on an adventure to the Mediterranean! Were making our way to the cool blue waters of the sea to find the best recipes from all over the region. Every segment, well present a few and then show you our favorite. Opa!

programme.title: Veggies Veggies Everywhere
programme.desc: Today, well be showing you how to use green veggies in every meal, including snacks! We hope youre ready, because Mom wants you to eat all the veggies on your plate!

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today weve got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want! Not only will we share some great recipes but we will let you know which ones are our favorites too. What are we waiting for? Lets get to the pizza!

programme.title: Crock Pots and Steamers
programme.desc: Today, well be checking out some incredible recipes that can be made in a crock pot or a steamer! From soups to regular meals, even right down to some unconventional ideas, weve got it all. Plug in those crock pots, its time to get steamy!

programme.title: European Adventure
programme.desc: Today, we embark on a European Adventure! Well be visiting the United Kingdom, Germany, France, and Greece to check out their culinary wonders. So what are we waiting for? Lets get to it!

programme.title: Winter Wonderland
programme.desc: When the cold and snowy season descends upon us, its only fitting youll want some delicious, home-cooked food to warm you up. Good thing were taking a trip through our Winter Wonderland today! So toss aside those mittens... its time to cook!

programme.title: Dumplings, Steam Buns, and Dim Sum, Oh My!
programme.desc: In a city with over 60 Michelin star restaurants, one brother will live and dine like a king, while the other will check out the citys more affordable street food scene.

programme.title: Simplicity vs. Splendor on the Seaside
programme.desc: Soaking in the beauty and elegance of the French Riviera, Marko and Alex are in Nice to enjoy the simplicity and splendor of this seaside city.

programme.title: Keep Austin Weird
programme.desc: In the state capital of Texas, Marko and Alex see what Austin has to offer. An eclectic city known for its music and cuisine, the guys brave the Texas heat and check out what keeps Austin weird.

programme.title: Levels of Luxury in Laos
programme.desc: Sandwiched between Thailand, Vietnam, and Cambodia, Laos is a destination often overlooked by tourists. Marko and Alex are uncovering the hidden gem of Vientiane, the capital city, to see what goes on in this sleepy town beside the Mekong River.

programme.title: The Gainful Grace of Geneva
programme.desc: Marko and Alex find themselves in the prosperous and pristine city of Geneva, Switzerland. A city nestled alongside a beautiful glacier-fed lake, the guys will explore the riches Geneva has to offer.

programme.title: The Thriving Traditions of Taipei
programme.desc: Welcome to the buzzing capital of Taiwan. A rich blend of cultures, old meets new in this thriving metropolis of Taipei. Marko and Alex eat their way through the city, experiencing some unique traditions along the way.

programme.title: The Lions Share of Lyon
programme.desc: Marko and Alex head to Lyon, France, a city known for its gastronomy and endless history.

programme.title: Oceanside in Okinawa
programme.desc: Ocean breeze, turquoise waters and a whole lot of amazing cuisine. Marko and Alex are soaking up that island life in Okinawa, Japan and learning what makes it so unique.

programme.title: Genoa From Above and Below
programme.desc: In Genoa, the brothers cruise the streets, while one of them gets a taste for the lavish lifestyle of Italys Northwestern port. They take in all the views: heads in the clouds on a high-flying funicular, and just above water at the local aquarium.

programme.title: The L.A. Lifestyle
programme.desc: Green juice, avocado toast, and surfers galore. Marko and Alex are back home in Los Angeles to explore their town, staycation style. From downtown to the beach, the guys do everything fun under the sun in the city of angels.

programme.title: Origins to Originals
programme.desc: From roast chicken to smash burgers to hot sauce, Stephanie Izard meets three different chefs putting their own California-inspired spin on food from their heritage by remixing traditional recipes that center local, fresh ingredients.

programme.title: Unique Eats
programme.desc: From a chef making Italian pasta with Mexican flavors to a groundbreaking functional cocktail bar to a couple that roasts whole goats behind a tire shop, Stephanie Izard finds unique eateries serving up one-of-a-kind food.

programme.desc: From brothers selling moms Syrian food to a Filipino family remixing a classic dessert to a mom and son running an Indian restaurant out of their house, Stephanie meets multi-gen families turning family recipes into smash hit food business.

programme.desc: From a homerun Greek dinner party series to a backyard thats become a gourmet deli to a Burmese pop up running out of an apartment kitchen, Stephanie Izard meets cooks finding ingenious ways to serve mouth-watering food out of their houses.

programme.title: Spring Fling
programme.desc: Spring Fling is here, and were going to show you some fantastic recipes to enjoy some well deserved time in the sun. What are we waiting for? Lets check it out!

programme.title: Italian Classics
programme.desc: On this episode, were going to show you some of our favorite Italian classics. Pasta, pizza, and more... you name it, weve got it. So, what are you waiting for? Its time to get cooking!

programme.title: Eating Vegan
programme.desc: On this episode of Tastemades Recipe Rundown, were switching things up and running on pure plant power! Thats right, today were featuring some incredible vegan eats!

programme.title: A Trip to Latin America
programme.desc: We hope you brought your passport, because were heading to Latin America! Whether its breakfast, lunch, dinner or dessert, were going to show you some delicious dishes, each with their own unique Latin flair!

programme.title: Southern Home Cooking
programme.desc: Today, were going on a trip down south for a taste of some country home cooking. Our quest for the best southern dish covers breakfast, lunch, dinner, and of course, dessert. But we better get moving, theyre ringing the dinner bell!

programme.title: Cheese!
programme.desc: Today, its all about cheese: from the melted gooey-ness to just plain old slices, cheese makes the world go round. Well showcase recipes that feature cheese in all forms. So strap in, its time to get cheesy.

programme.title: Mediterranean Meals
programme.desc: Today, were going on an adventure to the Mediterranean! Were making our way to the cool blue waters of the sea to find the best recipes from all over the region. Every segment, well present a few and then show you our favorite. Opa!

programme.title: Veggies Veggies Everywhere
programme.desc: Today, well be showing you how to use green veggies in every meal, including snacks! We hope youre ready, because Mom wants you to eat all the veggies on your plate!

programme.title: Pizza Time
programme.desc: Today weve got pizza all day for you: in the morning, in the evening, literally any time you want! Not only will we share some great recipes but we will let you know which ones are our favorites too. What are we waiting for? Lets get to the pizza!

programme.title: Crock Pots and Steamers
programme.desc: Today, well be checking out some incredible recipes that can be made in a crock pot or a steamer! From soups to regular meals, even right down to some unconventional ideas, weve got it all. Plug in those crock pots, its time to get steamy!

programme.title: A Thanksgiving Harvest
programme.desc: Time to dig in to the one holiday of the year that is all about the food! Think outside the pumpkin pie crust for these four unique offerings. Mias got you covered with the bread, two show-stopping desserts, and a creative way to use your leftovers!

programme.title: Holiday Cookies
programme.desc: Cookies are the number one baked item during the holidays. Mia shows us how to make some new and inspiring recipes; from buttercream stickers to zebra shortbread leading to a final bake that will make any cookie lover do a double take!

programme.title: Gingerbread Spectacular!
programme.desc: Its time to celebrate all things gingerbread! This classic holiday flavor gets an update from Mia. From the not-so-basic cake, to the most delectable cookie, and finally the ultimate gingerbread house; Mia will show why this is a holiday staple.

programme.title: Holiday Party Treats
programme.desc: Host the ultimate holiday party with these sweet and savory recipes for a crowd! Create a spread for all to enjoy. Mia will whip up wintery bark, bake a savory holiday wreath, and design a cupcake tree complete with sugared and piped ornaments.

programme.title: Bake in the New Year!
programme.desc: Mia is ringing in the new year with these chic bakes. Fortune cookies for luck, a champagne dessert, a gilded, tuxedo inspired cake-over, and a cocktail to keep you awake until midnight. The only thing missing from the celebration is the ball drop!

programme.title: Wrap it Up!
programme.desc: First, Frankie packs a one-two punch of bargain and nutrition with butternut squash in three nostalgic, old school dishes. Then he shows you how to prep portable wraps at home for easy, peasey lunches.

programme.title: Warm + Cozy Winter
programme.desc: Frankie gets cozy in the Struggle kitchen with recipes that bring all the warmth, flavor and joy during the coldest days of winter. From a casual weekday dinner to a special weekend meal, these dishes are sure to keep you warm and cozy.

programme.title: 5-Ingredient Recipes
programme.desc: Who said struggle meals cant be delicious? Dont sleep on these 5-ingredient recipes simple weeknight meals that are anything but boring, and with a few pantry staples, youll have dinner on the table in no time.

programme.title: A Cruciferous Delicious Time
programme.desc: No veggie family packs the same nutritious punch as the cruciferous family, and with a shelf life this long, theyve become a fixture in Frankies meal rotation. These delicious and easy-to-make recipes will win everyone over in no time.

programme.title: Mayo: The Secret Ingredient
programme.desc: Who knew mayo could be such a savvy secret agent? Its a controversial condiment that can unlock the buttery, crispy, decadent codes of our favorite dishes, without leaving a trace of mayo-ness. Best of all, its easy to make at home!

programme.title: Struggle Soup
programme.desc: Warm and hearty bowls of veggies, beans, pasta, and more, these soups will have you returning for seconds all year round. Frankies soup blueprints can turn everyday ingredients into extraordinary soups, with endless flavor opportunity.

programme.title: Crunchy
programme.desc: Reaching textural nirvana is never easy, but Frankie explores several ways to achieve the perfect crunch in his dishes, both savory and sweet. Add this elusive element to your recipes without adding cost to your budget.

programme.title: Struggle Sandwich
programme.desc: In a sandwich, every component plays a role. With a supporting cast of fixins, and Frankies cost-saving homemade twists, these sandwiches just might steal the show.

programme.title: Vintage
programme.desc: Frankie cooks his way back in time with his favorite vintage recipes. These oldie-but-goodie dishes are not only nostalgic and comforting, but theyll also fill you up without costing you a pretty penny.

programme.title: Spice Is Nice
programme.desc: Flavor, flavor, flavor. Frankie shows us the way around the spice cabinet. All it takes is a couple primary dried spices to make a variety of homemade spice blends. Bonus: Frankie also tackles a monster challenge with our favorite monster guest!

programme.title: Rent Week
programme.desc: Its the first of the month, when you spend your whole paycheck on rent and bills. Your fridge is looking pretty sad and the grocery budget is low. Frankie cooks up some go-to pantry meals and teaches us how to better prep for this time of the month.

programme.title: Beans Beans Beans
programme.desc: Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes. Beans are the gift that keeps on giving, so dont be scared to eat too many. Remember, theyre good for your heart.

programme.title: Mushroom Mania
programme.desc: Frankie takes us on a magical mushroom trip. Theyre an affordable plant-based meat replacement, packed with nutritional value. Well learn all things mushrooms and how to make inventive, flavorful dishes that might trip you out on their awesomeness.

programme.title: Game Day
programme.desc: Frankie throws a game day party for under $25. He makes three no-fuss appetizers that are cheaper, healthier, and tastier than subpar game day take out. So gather around with friends and cheer on your favorite teams. Or just eat. Both are a win.

programme.title: Root-to-Stem
programme.desc: Frankie teaches us how to use whole vegetables, from root-to-stem, which means no food goes to waste. Learn how to use vegetable stalks you would normally throw away. Root-to-stem cooking: less waste, more food, and more nutrition. Frankies favorite

programme.title: Bacon My Heart
programme.desc: Versatility is important. These three items - bacon, eggs, and a whole chicken - will feed you a plethora of delicious meals... and for cheap!

programme.title: Instant Gratification
programme.desc: Everyone loves carbs! Endlessly versatile, cheap, and super filling - Frankie shows you tricks for pasta, pizza dough, and delicious, easy ramen meals that arent soup.

programme.title: Beans Beans Beans
programme.desc: Frankie will teach the basics of preparing beans from scratch while making super tasty recipes. Beans are the gift that keeps on giving, so dont be scared to eat too many. Remember, theyre good for your heart.

programme.title: Taste Selebriti
programme.desc: A food-travelogue program where 13 local celebrities will return to their hometowns to share traditional cuisines, unique foods and popular dishes in their states.

programme.title: Travel Lawak
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Semmaiyaana Saapadu
programme.desc: A mom and her daughters modernize traditional cooking with healthier versions of beloved recipes, serving up nostalgia with a nutritious twist.

programme.title: Kak Kek Ke Kelate
programme.desc: Join alter ego Catriona Ross as she uncovers the most popular dishes, iconic locations, hidden gems and, as always, the vibrant people on her travels throughout Kelantan.

programme.title: RASA Anak Emak Anak Bapak
programme.desc: Program masakan ini memerlukan selebriti jemputan membawa ibu atau bapa mereka menjelajah Malaysia bagi merasa sendiri masakan kegemaran ibu bapa masing-masing.

programme.title: Garden of Treasure
programme.desc: Buckle up as Darren takes us back on the road in this new season! Join him as he discovers herb gardens filled with treasures across Malaysias farms And markets - and scales the mountains of East Malaysia, searching for the medicinal herbs used by the aboriginal people And local Chinese.

programme.title: Savouring Sibu: Taste of the Swan City
programme.desc: Savouring Sarawak: Taste of the Swan City showcases Sibus Foo Chow, Malay and Melanau dishes, blending tradition and trends, with meals shared from tiffin boxes in real-life settings.

programme.title: Caves And Caverns
programme.desc: Our hostess explores Borneos hidden gems, documenting her experiences, flora, fauna, paragliding, bird watching, and stunning sunsets, ensuring a captivating and exciting adventure.

programme.title: Istimewa Anggun: IFFKL 2025
programme.desc: Istimewa Anggun: Islamic Fashion Festival Kuala Lumpur 2025 episod 2, mempamerkan fesyen Islamik dengan rekaan kreatif dan penyertaan pereka dari seluruh dunia.

programme.title: (L) Grandstand Liga Premier Sarawak 2025
programme.desc: Grandstand Liga Premier sorotan perlawanan, analisis taktikal, dan perbincangan mendalam bersama hos dan tetamu jemputan tentang perkembangan pasukan dan pemain dalam Liga Bola Sepak Premier Sarawak.

programme.title: (L) TVS Nightline
programme.desc: Memaparkan laporan peristiwa yang berlaku di seluruh Malaysia dalam bahasa English

programme.title: Staycation With Fattah
programme.desc: Staycation With Fattah kembali lagi dengan Musim 3, menampilkan lebih banyak destinasi pelancongan menarik yang diterokai oleh Fattah di Sarawak, Negeri di Bawah Bayu Sabah, dan Semenanjung Malaysia.

programme.title: Ba Pengujung Simpang Ati
programme.desc: Mengisahkan perjalanan hidup Andy (Wandie Alie) dan Nedin (Nedine Vincent) yang berdepan halangan keluarga,perkahwinan,perceraian,dan cinta semula selepas kematian Ain,serta ikatan yang terjalin demi anak.

programme.title: Rezeki Angin
programme.desc: Siri ini membawa kita mengenali unsur alam iaitu elemen angin dalam kisah rakyat jelata mencari rezeki. Siri ini adalah pelengkap kepada elemen air, tanah dan api yang diperkenalkan pada siri sebelum ini.

programme.title: Homegrown
programme.desc: Local native chef explore these home-grown ingredients from farm to table; sharing its goodness through the traditional ways of using the ingredients and plans to elevate the flavors in modern cooking.

programme.title: Belawan Masak
programme.desc: Dua selebriti Cef, Pison Jaujip (Sabah) dan Achang Libat (Sarawak), bersaing memasak menggunakan bahan utama dari hutan atau pasar, dengan cara masakan berbeza, untuk menjadi pemenang 6 episod.

programme.title: Negeri Yang Hilang Di Sarawak
programme.desc: Datu Dr.Haji Sanib bin Haji Said yang menghabiskan sepanjang hayatnya mengabdi sebagai ilmuwan dan cendekiawan. Biografi beliau menjadi intipati utama dalam mencari negeri Melayu yang hilang di Sarawak.

programme.title: Borneo Dive
programme.desc: Explore the unique dive sites of Sabah and Sarawak, which attract both local and international divers. The region offers a rich variety of marine life for recreational and avid divers to observe.

programme.title: Jarum And Benang
programme.desc: Fatin and Juna merupakan kawan baik yang lahir di kampung yang sama. Mereka berdua merupakan pereka fesyen yang terkenal tetapi kejayaan mereka tidak disenangi oleh Wida,seorang pereka veteran.

programme.title: Dari Kebun Ke Dapur
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang akan memaparkan 26 masakan dari 13 bahagian di negeri Sarawak yang sudah pastinya menjanjikan masakan yang terdiri daripada pelbagai etnik and kaum dan juga dari hasil kebun yang segar.

programme.title: Heart at Work
programme.desc: Heart at work delves behind the scenes into the lives of ordinary Sarawakians striving for the extraordinary. Witness for yourself as they recount their journey to success in their field of work.

programme.title: Sumandak Takes Borneo
programme.desc: Dewi Remaja 2022 winner Tracie and two friends explore Borneos beauty-food history,culture,nature,and diversity-while uplifting communities through local social enterprises in this inspiring travelogue.

programme.title: My Health, My Choice
programme.desc: My Health, My Choice explores daily practices, behaviors, and health issues, highlighting factors like attitudes, diet, environment, and relationships, and provides practical solutions.

programme.title: Kubah Borneo

programme.desc: Drama kemasyarakatan yang memaparkan hubungan kekeluargaan, persahabatan dan percintaan.

programme.title: Lelaki Itu Untukku
